title: Upgraded Apartment Homes. Spacious Floor Plans, Private Entry
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-Air Conditioned', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Package Acceptance', '-Private Entrance', '-Additional Storage', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-Laundry Facility', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
